actions.name: Mining Node
actions.summary: This is a generic placeholder for multiple types of mining nodes.
actions.description: Make a DC {DC} Strength (Athletics) check. On a successful check, you harvest a resource according to the following table: {table}

actions.name: Insect Gathering
actions.summary: Search for valuable insects in the area.
actions.description: Make a DC {DC} Perception (Insight) check. On a successful check, you find one rare insect. You can then use this insect for alchemical purposes or trade it with NPCs.

actions.name: Hunting Trap Check
actions.summary: Check your hunting traps for any captured monsters.
actions.description: Perform a DC {DC} Intelligence (Investigation) check. Each trap has a chance of resulting in a monster being caught. High level monsters will have lower chances of being caught in a trap.

actions.name: Carving Monster Parts
actions.summary: Utilize your skills to carve valuable resources from a defeated monster.
actions.description: Make a DC {DC} Dexterity (Sleight of Hand) check. The difficulty is based on the monster's size and the rarity of the part. Successfully carving a rare part will grant you experience points and valuable resources.

actions.name: Supply Box Check
actions.summary: Check supplied crates left by hunters who have passed through this area.
actions.description: Perform a DC {DC} Perception (Insight) check. You may find useful items like potions, bombs, tools, or even rare monster parts that other hunters have overlooked.

actions.name: Tree Climbing
actions.summary: Scale the treacherous heights of ancient trees.
actions.description: Make a DC {DC} Strength (Athletics) check. Climbing trees allows you to reach higher vantage points, spot monsters from a distance, or even gather rare tree-dwelling insects.

actions.name: River Fishing
actions.summary: Cast your line in the hopes of catching a rare fish.
actions.description: Make a DC {DC} Dexterity (Stealth) check. Fishing requires patience and skill. You must remain hidden while waiting for the perfect bite. A successful check reveals a fish worth taking.

actions.name: Campfire Cooking
actions.summary: Rest, heal wounds, and prepare a meal at the campfire.
actions.description: You can heal a number of hit points equal to twice your proficiency bonus. Additionally, while at camp you can prepare simple meals that grant temporary bonuses to abilities based on the ingredients used.
